Info --> #include_team How to use our App This app allow to record a small audio file (we suggest at max 10s long if you don\'t want to wait too much) and send it to a server where a script will transcribe it to text.\nEvery file can be located in the KaldiMobile directory on the root of your device external storage. About Kaldi Kaldi (from the legendary goatherd who discovered coffee) is a toolkit for speech recognition written in C++ and licensed under the Apache License v2.0.\nFor more details visit http://kaldi-asr.org/.
About us We are three Computer Engineering students from University of Padua, Italy. We developed this app as our final project of Embedded System Programming course in Summer 2016.
